description: The Moonraker Trail system provides lots of epic cross-country in the area (Mount 7 provides the DH).  If you are heading to Golden, check out Moonraker Trails and MT 7!  Ask anywhere in town; better yet, call Alpine Meadows Lodge; they've been improving the trails over the years.
directions:
Golden, BC is located 3 hours west of Calgary, Alberta on Hwy1. Take the main Golden exit on Hwy 95, turn right onto Main Street, and then take the next right turn with signage for Alpine Meadows, Golden Golf and Kicking Horse Mountain Resort. Follow the road out of Golden, cross the single lane bridge and turn left at the next intersection.  Follow Elk Road to the Lodge (4 miles from Golden).
